=== Current Issues ===
headphone jack sense don't work properly without previous configuration.

On Feisty add
<pre>
options snd-hda-intel model=laptop
</pre>
to <code>/etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base</code> and reload <code>snd-hda-intel</code> module.
